string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Kgotla link go bula account ya gago ya Lichess:
Re humane kgopela ya go mpshafatša password ya gago.
Ge o dirile kgopelo ye, kgotle link ya ka tlase. Ge go se bjalo hlokomologa molaetša wo.
Kgonthišiša aterese ya email e mpsha, %s
O kgopetše go fetola aterese ya gago ya email.
Go kgonthišiša gore email ke ya gago, kgotla link ya ka tlase:

O kgonne go bula account mo go https://lichess.org.
Letlakala la boitsebišo ke le: %1$s. O ka le kgabisa mo %2$s.
Iphsine, ba kgoro ya gago ba phele ba fihletše kgoši ya moraloki ka wena!
(Go kgotla ga go šome? Leka go e kgorametša ka gare ga browser ya gago!)
O ke molaetša mabapi le tšhomišo ya gago ya %s.
Go ikgokaganya le rena, re kgopela o šomiše %s.
